description: The Puffing Tom is Tom's fully functioning Sea Train that travels between Water 7, St. Poplar, San Faldo, Pucci, and the Judicial Island Enies Lobby. It is the only vessel capable of safely navigating through the Aqua Laguna storm.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Infiltrates the Puffing Tom
keyEvents.description: Sanji makes his move inside the train, attacking government agents as he works to reach Robin who is being transported to Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: The Sea Train becomes the battleground for Sanji's solo rescue mission.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Defeats Jerry in Car 7
keyEvents.description: Sanji defeats CP6 agent Jerry using his Brochette technique in the seventh passenger car of the Puffing Tom.
keyEvents.significance: Sanji clears one of multiple government obstacles aboard the train.

statusHistory.reason: Currently transporting Robin and CP9 to Enies Lobby during the Aqua Laguna storm

description: Water 7 is a city in Paradise known for its expert shipwrights and unique water canal system. The city is built on multiple levels to protect against the annual Aqua Laguna storm, though the lower levels still flood regularly.

keyEvents.title: Aqua Laguna Floods Water 7
keyEvents.description: The annual Aqua Laguna storm begins flooding the lower levels of Water 7, forcing evacuation to higher ground.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the destructive power of Aqua Laguna and the city's vulnerability to natural disasters.

keyEvents.title: Ocean Mysteriously Drains
keyEvents.description: The sea around Water 7 recedes to an abnormal distance, signaling an unprecedented Aqua Laguna approaching.
keyEvents.significance: Creates mounting tension and demonstrates this year's storm is more dangerous than usual.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Found Stuck Between Buildings
keyEvents.description: Nami discovers Luffy wedged between two buildings in Water 7, still unable to free himself.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew's scattered state and the urgency to reunite before Aqua Laguna hits.

statusHistory.reason: Under threat from abnormally severe Aqua Laguna

description: The main train station in Water 7 where the Puffing Tom Sea Train departs and arrives. Located in the lower levels of the city, it is vulnerable to Aqua Laguna flooding.

keyEvents.title: Train Station Floods from Aqua Laguna
keyEvents.description: Initial Aqua Laguna waves flood the train station's lower areas, endangering those still present.
keyEvents.significance: Creates immediate danger and forces evacuation.

keyEvents.title: Paulie Rescues People at Station
keyEvents.description: Paulie uses his rope abilities to save Nami and conductors from drowning in the flooding station.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the life-threatening nature of Aqua Laguna.

keyEvents.title: Nami Receives Sanji's Letter at Station
keyEvents.description: A messenger delivers Sanji's letter to Nami at the flooded train station, revealing Sanji's actions.
keyEvents.significance: The station serves as the communication point between the Sea Train and Water 7 groups.
